title: Am I The A*Hole: She Refuses To Pay Rent
description:
She (29) and her boyfriend (33) have been dating for three years and decided that the next step in their relationship would be to move in together. Her boyfriend owns a home that he makes mortgage payments on he would like for her to move in with him, but there is one problem; He wants her to pay rent and she’s not going for it
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
